https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xdgNtPklDNVXv8dPY7qrkFYEsc9.jpg Jealous Esther does everything she can to make virtuous Gloria look bad. She tells lies, and comes to envy Gloria her career and her husband. In part two, Esther works on ruining Gloria's children. Where will it end? Blood Sister
